p: The main reason for the differences between the two decades in the model is that the parameterization of the fast oxidation of Hg 0 to HgO during the AMDEs depends on the sea-ice fraction. The lower sea-ice fraction in the 2090s compared to the 1990s will result in a lower oxidation of Hg 0 to HgO and therefore a higher concentration of Hg 0 and lower concentrations of RGM and TPM.
